title: Chow mein
description: Wok-master Ken Hom delivers another sensational stir-fry with spring onions, mangetout and lightly marinated chicken.
ingredients: 50g/2oz Parma ham or cooked ham, finely shredded
1 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
½ tsp freshly ground white pepper
2 tsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
½ tsp freshly ground white pepper
